entries.name: COMPONENT
entries.desc: An Array of the available components for Bundler::URI::MailTo.

entries.name: DEFAULT_PORT
entries.desc: A Default port of nil for Bundler::URI::MailTo.

entries.name: headers
entries.desc: E-mail headers set by the URL, as an Array of Arrays.

entries.name: to
entries.desc: The primary e-mail address of the URL, as a String.

entries.name: build(args)
entries.desc: Creates a new Bundler::URI::MailTo object from components, with syntax checking.

entries.name: new(*arg)
entries.desc: Creates a new Bundler::URI::MailTo object from generic URL components with no syntax checking.

entries.name: to_mailtext()
entries.desc: Returns the RFC822 e-mail text equivalent of the URL, as a String.
